Room.Name: Path in the plains
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. The path continues east, north and west leads to plains and you see the path towards the north gate of midgaard to the south.

Exit.Description: You see the grassy plains.
You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.
You see the grassy plains.

Room.Name: Path in the plains
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. The path continues east and west.

Exit.Description: You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.
You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.

Room.Name: Path in the plains
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. The path continues north and west.

Exit.Description: You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.
You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.

Room.Name: Path in the plains
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. The path leads north and south. To the east and the west you have the grassy plains.

Exit.Description: You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.
To the east you notice the grassy plains.
You notice nothing special, except that the path in the plains continues.
To the west you can see more of the beautiful grassy plains.

Room.Name: Path in the plains
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. The Path leads north and south.

Exit.Description: The path continues north as small foothills begins to appear.
The path leads south towards the town.

Room.Name: Path in the plains
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in the rough plains. You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you watch the beautiful landscaping here. To the east and west you see the grassy plains. The path extends into small foothills to the north and also continues south.

Exit.Description: The path continues into the small foothills.
You see the grassy plains here.
The path continues towards Midgaard.
You see the grassy plains here.

Room.Name: Path in the foothills
Room.Description: You are on the path leading through the small foothills. The wind blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. From the north you sense a certain freshness. The path continues east and south. You smell freshness from north.

Exit.Description: You see grassy plains and perhaps some crystal clear water.
The path in the plains wind through the small foothills.

Room.Name: Path in the foothills
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in the small foothills. The winds are more than average here but it feels nice. You can follow the path east or west.

Exit.Description: The path continues in the foothills

Room.Name: Path in the foothills
Room.Description: You are walking on a narrow path in the foothills. You feel the strong winds blow through your hair as you study the beautiful landscaping here. The path goes north and west.

Exit.Description: The narrow path through the foothills turns left here.
To the west you can see the path continues.

Room.Name: Path in the foothills
Room.Description: You are walking on a path situated in foothills. To the west you sense a certain freshness and the path continues south and east.

Exit.Description: You see the path continues in the foothills.
You see grassy plains and perhaps some crystal clear water.

Room.Name: Path in the foothills
Room.Description: You are walking on a long path in the east-west direction. The surroundings are green, vegetated foothills. You are able to force your way through some dense plants to the north.

Exit.Description: You can't really see much through the vegetation on the foothills.
To the east you notice that the path continues towards a T-intersection.
You just see the path through the foothills.

Room.Name: Path in the foothills
Room.Description: You are walking on the long, narrow path through the foothills. To your east you see a T-intersection and to the west the path continues far.

Exit.Description: You can go to the T-intersection this way.
You can see the long path through the plains.

Room.Name: The path intersection
Room.Description: You are standing on an intersection between 3 paths. To the west you can follow a long, narrow path through the foothills. To the north a wide path leads to the Village of Ofcol and an ancient path leads towards the south.

Exit.Description: Here is a partially hidden, ancient looking path.

Room.Name: Road to Ofcol
Room.Description: You are walking on a wide road with trail marks on it. To the north you see the village of Ofcol and to the south there is the T intersection. You can enter the foothills west. The foothills to your east are too steep to climb.

Exit.Description: The road continues towards Ofcol.
You can see the T-intersection in the souther direction.
You think you can climb these foothills.

Room.Name: Outside Ofcol
Room.Description: You are standing outside the village of Ofcol. The village looks very small, but still a nice and safe place to stay. You may enter the city to the north or journey towards the T-intersection in the southern direction.

Exit.Description: Here you see the road go towards the intersection.

Room.Name: Gallow hill
Room.Description: You walk in the grassy plains. On this little hill you can see two gallows, with rotting human tissue hanging from the ropes. There is a sign here.

Exit.Description: The plains extend far to the north.
To the east you can see a small path in the plains.
To the south you can see a small path in the plains.
The plains extend far to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign says: Loyal citizens of Midgaard. These are the earthly remains of the two heretics 'Dim' and 'Gamma' of this world. Having forged them- selves to immortality, they called upon themselves the anger of the implementators. Let this be a lesson too all ..... -- the Powers that Be.

Room.Name: Grassy plains
Room.Description: You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind is strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are visible.

Exit.Description: The plains extend far to the north.
When you look to the east you notice at small path.

Room.Name: Grassy plains
Room.Description: You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind is strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are visible. City of Midgaard is to the south but so are some VERY steep slopes.

Exit.Description: The plains extend far to the east.
A small path is running through the plains.

Room.Name: Grassy plains
Room.Description: You walk in the beautiful grassy plains. The wind is strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are visible.

Exit.Description: The plains extend far to the north.
The plains extend far to the east.
The plains extend far to the south.

Room.Name: Grassy plains
Room.Description: You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind is strong and rough. To the north you can see the foothills and just behind mountain peaks are visible.

Exit.Description: To the north, the plains extend into small foothills, behind a small hill you notice something ...
The plains extend far to the east.
The plains extend far to the south.

Room.Name: Grassy plains
Room.Description: You walk in some grassy plains. The wind is strong and rough. To the north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are visible.

Exit.Description: The plains extend into small foothills to the north.
East of here you see a winding path in the plains.
The plains extend far to the south.
The plains extend far to the west.

Room.Name: Grassy plains
Room.Description: You walk in the grassy plains. The wind is fairly strong.

Exit.Description: The plains extend far to the south.
A small path is running through the plains.

Room.Name: Grassy foothills
Room.Description: You walk in the grassy foothills north of the plains. The wind is rough. To the north you can see foothills and just behind them mountain peaks are visible.

Exit.Description: The small foothills extend into foothills far to the north.
The small foothills extend into plains far to the south.
The small foothills extend far to the west.

Room.Name: The steep foothills
Room.Description: You walk in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here. To the north you can see a grassy valley with wildflowers.

Exit.Description: You see a path toward the valley.
The foothills extend far to the east.
On the horizon you can see the City of Midgaard.

Room.Name: The steep foothills
Room.Description: You are walking in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here. To the north you can see the mountains towering over you. Pine trees grow here.

Exit.Description: The foothills extend far to the east.
The foothills extend downwards to the south. In the horizon you can see the City Of Midgaard.
The foothills extend far to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The all too quiet trees suggest that something roams these woods.
The mountains seems dark and all most alive, as they contrast against the sky.

Room.Name: The steep foothills
Room.Description: You are walking in the steep foothills. It is rather hard to move here. Further to the north you can see the mountains towering over you. Several pinetrees grow here.

Exit.Description: The foothills extend into smaller hills far to the east.
The foothills extend far to the west.

Room.Name: The pool in the foothills
Room.Description: You are standing by a pool in the small foothills. It is clear and cold. A steep slope rises up into the foothills to the north. Behind them ... The mountains.

Exit.Description: To the east you notice a small path in the foothills.
To the south a path winds its way south into the plains.
The foothills extend far to the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The pool is crystal clear, but as you look into it you notice that you can't see the bottom of it ... It must be pretty deep.

Room.Name: The foothills
Room.Description: You are walking in some foothills. It is rather hard to move here. Further to the north you can see the mountains towering over you. Several pinetrees grow here.

Exit.Description: To the south a steep slope runs down to a small path in the foothills.

Room.Name: In front of hut in foothills
Room.Description: You are standing in the foothills. To the west, well hidden among the small foothills and pines, you see a small hut. To the north you can see the foothills, and some pineforrest. Further on mountain peaks are visible.

Exit.Description: The steep foothills seems hard to climb
The foothills extend far to the east.
To the south the foothills extend into plains far to the south.
You see a small crumbled hut here, must be a hermit living here.

Room.Name: Hermit's hut
Room.Description: You are inside the hermit's hut. It is rather old, but serves it purpose. It keeps its habitant from the rough winds and dangerous beasts of the plains and foothills. There is a small fireplace here.

Exit.Description: Through the door you can see the foothills.

ExtraDescription.Description: The hermit cooks here.

Room.Name: The ancient path
Room.Description: You are moving on an ancient path. The path is slightly covered with leaves and twitches. To the north you can see the T-crossing and the path continues south.

Exit.Description: As you look to the north you see a T-intersection.

Room.Name: The ancient path
Room.Description: You are standing on the ancient path which runs north and south. The path is hardly visible here.

Exit.Description: You see the ancient path.
You trace the path carefully and see no immediate dangers.

Room.Name: The ancient path
Room.Description: You are standing on the ancient path which runs north and south. The path is hardly visible here.

Exit.Description: You see the ancient path.
You trace the path carefully and see no immediate dangers.

Room.Name: The ancient path
Room.Description: The path runs north and east from here. You notice some markers placed along the side of the path.

Exit.Description: You see the ancient path winding its way north from here. Looks safe.
Further ahead you see a bridge over a small creak.

ExtraDescription.Description: The markers seems like normal stones, but the way they are arranged makes you think there is something special about them.

Room.Name: The wooden bridge
Room.Description: You have stepped upon a wooden bridge. It looks old but safe to cross. It is made of a wood you haven't seen before.

Exit.Description: The path continues, further ahead you notice some rock formations.
The ancient path leads west and turns north further ahead.

ExtraDescription.Description: The rock formations are made of 7 huge, monolith like stones, placed in a symbolic circle. You notice it's possible to enter the ring.

Room.Name: The ancient path
Room.Description: You find yourself located between the bridge and the rock formations. As you approach the formations you begin to realize the true size of them, about 15 feet tall and almost perfect rectangular shape. You feel impressed with the awesome sight.

Exit.Description: To the east you enter the ring of stones. You wonder if it's safe.
To the west the ancient path leads across the wooden bridge.

ExtraDescription.Description: The rock formations are made of seven huge monolith placed in a circle. You notice it's possible to enter the ring.

Room.Name: Grassy plains
Room.Description: You walk in the grassy plains among the herbs which grow here. The wind is strong and rough. Far to the north you can see the foothills and further on mountain peaks are visible.

Exit.Description: The plains extend far to the north.
The plains extend far to the east.

Room.Name: The Stones of G'harne
Room.Description: You are in the center of 7, 15 ft tall monolith like black stones. In the center of the ring formed by the monolith you can't help noticing a big sacrifice altar. The ground is covered with dirt, but the altar shows no sign of such. West of here is the ancient path.

Exit.Description: You see a tunnel down there.

ExtraDescription.Description: The pictures are depicting evil rituals. You see druids pouring blood over herbs on an altar like this one. There are people calling giant worms into existence with dark spells.
You move closer to examine the sacrifice altar of G'harne. The altar is about 3 feet high, 10 feet long and 4 feet wide. It has engraved pictures of death rituals and horrifying worms.
The stones of G'harne tower fifteen feet over you. The giant stones are made of a material you haven't seen before. It resembles black marble, but somehow feels different.

Room.Name: Dark smelly tunnels
Room.Description: You are standing in a gloomy tunnel leading south and west, right under the altar of G'harne. The walls are covered with a smelly slime and small rotting pieces of a meat like substance, fills the air with an unbearable stench. You might be able to force your way up into fresh air from here.

Exit.Description: You welcome the sight of fresh air.

ExtraDescription.Description: You try to examine the substance closer, but must refrain from this as all you really want to do is puke. You puke.

Room.Name: Dead end of tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel comes to an abrupt end here. It simply looks like it hasn't been excavated further. North of here the tunnel makes a turn east.

Room.Name: Dark smelly tunnels
Room.Description: You are standing in a gloomy tunnel leading east and west. The walls are covered with a smelly slime and small rotting pieces of a meat like substance, fills the air with an unbearable stench.

Exit.Description: The tunnel continues in this direction.
The tunnel continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: You try to examine the substance closer, but must refrain from this as all you really want to do is puke. You puke.

Room.Name: Dark smelly tunnels
Room.Description: You are standing in a small smelly tunnel under the plains. The smell is growing stronger to the west, so is the density of the slime and other undeterminable substances ...

Exit.Description: The unbearable stench is less intensive in this direction.
The tunnel seems to extend into some kind of cave.

ExtraDescription.Description: BWADR! ...

Room.Name: The Hall of G'harne
Room.Description: You stand in the hall of G'harne. The walls are dressed with strange carving, symbolizing human sacrifice and people worshipping giant worms. Disgusting slime and gore are also very dominant in your view of this room.

Exit.Description: It looks like a good idea just to run in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: You puke.

Room.Name: Steep slope
Room.Description: You try to climb down the slope. > You slip! You fall and tumble. You hit your head HARD. You die. You've fallen, and you can't get up!

Room.Name: Open Plains
Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Name: Open Plains
Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Name: Open Plains
Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

Room.Name: Open Plains
Room.Description: The great plain stretches out before you, a sea of waving grasses undulating in the wind. The land is flat and expansive, dotted here and there with clusters of hardy trees and scrub. In the distance, sweeping bluffs rise up, their rugged cliffs and cliffs etched against the sky. The bluffs tower high above the plain, casting deep shadows over the grass below. Their craggy faces are etched with deep furrows and crevices, a testament to the relentless forces of nature that have shaped them over countless years.

NPC.name: oldstyle druid Aruncus
NPC.description: Aruncus is a tall, skinny druid with a face marked by nature. He seems to be in peace with himself and his surroundings.
NPC.longDescription: Aruncus the Druid is walking around here, searching for herbs.

NPC.name: oldstyle hermit sorbus
NPC.description: Sorbus bares the marks of a long, hard life in solitude. He is dressed in simple clothing and looks like he has little or nothing to say.
NPC.longDescription: Sorbus the Hermit is sitting here, roasting a rabbit.

NPC.name: oldstyle citizen
NPC.description: He seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others. He wears normal, light clothing and has an anonymous face.
NPC.longDescription: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... Stranger!

NPC.name: oldstyle citizen
NPC.description: She seems like a nice person with no interest in harming you or others. She wears a minimum of clothing and has big ... Eyes.
NPC.longDescription: There is a citizen of Ofcol here glaring at you ... Stranger!

NPC.name: oldstyle worm Shudde-M'ell
NPC.description: Shudde-M'ell is about 15 ft long and is surrounded by an evil stench, The worm is the protector of the treasure of G'harne and has been so for as long anyone can remember.
NPC.longDescription: Shudde-M'ell the Giant worm of G'harne is guarding his treasure.

NPC.name: oldstyle luxan shopkeeper
NPC.description: Luxan is dressed in a strange jacket. He looks like a mean trader from the outskirts of Midgaard. His life is seems to be totally occupied with trading. He looks very fit and capable of protecting his goods.
NPC.longDescription: Luxan the Shopkeeper is here, eager to sell you anything.

NPC.name: oldstyle keeper innkeeper
NPC.description: The Innkeeper looks skilled in brewing different beers and mixing the wierdest drinks known. He also looks very big.
NPC.longDescription: An Innkeeper is here waiting for your order.

NPC.name: oldstyle rabbit
NPC.description: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

NPC.name: dragon pet
NPC.description: Ravan's pet dragon is about 3 ft. Tall with small pointy teeth. The small wings are eagerly trying to lift her from the ground, but so far they haven't succeeded.
NPC.longDescription: Ravan's pet dragon is bouncing around here flapping her cute wings.

Item.Name: herbs herb timian
Item.ShortDescription: a small dusk of timian herbs
Item.LongDescription: Some herbs are lying here, small green leaves and tiny pink flowers.

ExtraDescription.Description: This herb smells rather spicy; maybe you should try it?

Item.Name: herbs herb gyvel
Item.ShortDescription: a small dusk of black gyvel
Item.LongDescription: Some black gyvel is lying here, dark green with black leaves and tiny blood red flowers.

ExtraDescription.Description: This herb smells rather special, but is it poisonous?

Item.Name: plant ivy
Item.ShortDescription: a small dusk of poison ivy
Item.LongDescription: Some poison ivy is growing here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This plant has dark green juicy leaves. You notice some small white thorns on it.

Item.Name: blood jar
Item.LongDescription: A small jar in a dark, red colour.

ExtraDescription.Description: The jar is made of dry clay, covered with markings suggesting its occult origin.

Item.Name: wild flowers
Item.LongDescription: A bunch of pretty wild flowers is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These wild flowers are really pretty. Just like the flowers you would wear in your hair.

Item.Name: amulet
Item.LongDescription: A strange looking amulet is lying here, half covered with dust.

ExtraDescription.Description: Judging from the signs inscripted in the amulet, you gather it must have belonged to a druid. It is weird looking with symbols from nature dominating it.

Item.Name: staff stick
Item.LongDescription: A staff with druidic marks have been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Then staff is about 5 ft long, engraved with mythical signs and figures. Otherwise the staff seems of no real interest.

Item.Name: rabbit roast wabbit
Item.LongDescription: You see a deliciously looking rabbit roast.

ExtraDescription.Description: Well the rabbit looks rather dead. You guess that this once was a ferocious rabbit who's life now has changed to that of a tasty wabbit woast.

Item.Name: template scroll
Item.LongDescription: A strange template made of an exotic green metal is placed here

ExtraDescription.Description: The template is made of an exotic green metal and looks centuries old. Inscripted upon is the words 'Ep ep fi'hur G'harne G'harne fhtagn Shudde-M'ell hyas Negg'h' And beneath the inscription you see horrifying death scenes depicted.

Item.Name: potion clear
Item.LongDescription: A clear potion wrapped in leather is unnoticed placed here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The leather wrapped around the potion is old and decayed, originating from an, to you, unknown creature.
As you examine the potion more, you notice the oddities of this potion. When you look through it you notice strange things... The clear potion is certainly not of this world.

Item.Name: scroll jhyfrdow
Item.LongDescription: An odd looking scroll is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The drawing pictures people gathered round giant stone formations, worshipping a giant worm like creature. It seems they are sacrificing some of their own species.
The scroll is titled 'jhyfrdow' and looks very old. As you examine it closer you notice primitive drawings of men doing some kind of a ritual.
